title: Baby it's cold outside! The cosiest jumpers to get you through winter
text:
When the temperature drops, there's nothing better than snuggling up in some gorgeous knitwear.

From classic cable knits to statement sweaters featuring polka dots and sequins, we've got your winter wardrobe update all sewn up. Here's our edit of the best knits you can buy right now - and some are even on sale.

Amazon might not be your first port of call for fashion, but it's worth checking out their original in-house label find. which is now available to buy in the UK.

We love this leopard print crew neck jumper, which is super soft to the touch and looks great with black jeans - or you could toughen it up with a leather skirt.

It comes in two colours, black/brown and white/grey, and is available in sizes 8 to 20. Check out find. for seriously stylish and well made items, from cosy knits and denim, to chic wrap dresses.

Buy now on Amazon

This wool alpaca blend jumper is classic cream, but the bold black polka dots turn it into a statement knit. We love its oversize style, dropped shoulders and voluminous puff sleeves. Team with a chiffon skirt and knee high boots or a leather jacket and jeans.

Buy now on & Other Stories

This premium quality rib-knit wool and cashmere blend jumper is super soft to the touch so could be your ideal winter companion. Its high turtle neck will keep you extra warm as the temperature drops. Also available in black.

Buy now on H&M

If you're bored of cream, this chunky knit by Hobbs has got your name on it. Add a colour pop to any outfit with the hot pink turtleneck, which is perfect for cold winter days. Made from a super soft cashmere blend, it's great dressed up or down. We especially love the front pocket detail. This one is currently on sale marked down from £99.

Buy now on Hobbs

This colour block jumper is super cosy and the perfect addition to your winter weekend wardrobe. In a classic thick cable knit, it looks great with jeans or try it with a leather skirt for a more edgy style.

Buy now on Mango

If stripes are more your thing, check out this bretton-style chunky knit grey and white jumper from Topshop. Pair with a leather skirt or even leather trousers if you're feeling daring.

Buy now on Topshop

This cosy chunky jumper makes us feel warm just looking at it. The thick cable knit fabric is super soft and cosy. It's the kind of jumper you throw on and snuggle up in on cold winter mornings. Definitely one for dressing down with jeans - or even wearing with your PJs - the oversized fit with turtle neck and cuff sleeves makes this jumper so comfy to wear. It's available in a range of colours. This one is rusty red, but you can also get it in black, grey, blue and yellow. Which one will be your favourite?

Buy now on Amazon

This one is a bit of a splurge - but it's got sequins on and could totally double as a Christmas jumper. A very classy Christmas jumper. Perfect for the party season, this is an online exclusive so snap one up while you can!

Buy now on Anthropologie
